amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to alleviate delays in compliance with existing federal regulations to vet prospective pilots, by enabling 3rd party access to the National Driver Register.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A008) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Cohen amendment (A008) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Cohen.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A008) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
